T04D3838:149a-1: aa bu dha bo dha ka n'a ma pra ka ra na /

T04D3838:149a-7: de nyid ma rtogs rtogs byed pa //

T04D3838:149a-12: chos kyi de kho na nyid do //
T04D3838:149a-13: gzhan gyis brgal ba ni gang zhe na /
T04D3838:149a-21: 'dir yang dgag pa ni bdag 'di gang yin /

T04D3838:149a-28: phung po la 'du ba yang ma yin te /

T04D3838:149a-30: lha sbyin ba lang dang ldan pa bzhin du phung po dang ldan pa yang ma yin no //
T04D3838:149a-31: de nas pha rol rgol bas /

T04D3838:149b-0: rmig pa la sogs pa 'grub bar 'gyur ba bzhin no zhe @149b na /
T04D3838:149b-1: brjod pa dpe'i khyad par nyon cig / dper na

T04D3838:149b-14: rdul phra rab kyang yod pa ma yin te /
T04D3838:149b-15: phyogs cha'i bye brag gis te /
T04D3838:149b-16: phyogs kyi dbye bas phye ba na /
T04D3838:149b-17: rdul phran la yang dbye ba mthong /
T04D3838:149b-18: gang la cha shas kyis brtags nas /
T04D3838:149b-19: de yi rdul phran ji ltar yod /

T04D3838:149b-21: dngos po yod pa ma yin no //
T04D3838:149b-22: dngos med gang gi yin par 'gyur /
T04D3838:149b-23: gang gis dngos dang dngos med shes /
T04D3838:149b-24: zhes bya ba ni chos la bdag med pa'o //

T04D3838:149b-33: na de'i tshe ri bong gi rva la sogs pa

T04D3838:149b-36: yod du chug mod ce na /

T04D3838:149b-40: 'jig pa yang yin mod ce na /
T04D3838:149b-42: ji ltar gang la skye ba dang 'jig pa med pa de la 'jig par 'gyur ro zhe na /
